text: Daryl Franklin Hohl, professionally known as Daryl Hall (born October 11, 1946), is an American rock, R&B; and soul singer, keyboardist, guitarist, songwriter and producer. He is best known as the co-founder and lead vocalist of Hall & Oates (with guitarist and songwriter John Oates). ==Other websites== *The Official Hall and Oates Website *Live From Daryl's House * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Pennsylvania Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pennsylvania
title: Daryl Hall
